visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts map chartOptions object to render a map of the United States with population density data. The chart should have a title 'US population density (/km²)', with styled axes and labels. The data series should represent the population density, with custom colors and logarithmic color axis. Additionally, the chart should include a legend, map navigation, and export options.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a map of the United States with population density data. The chart type is a map, specifically using the 'countries/us/us-all' map data. The title of the chart is 'US population density (/km²)', styled with appropriate font and color settings. The color axis is logarithmic, with a gradient from '#2b908f' to '#000022', and includes stops for smooth color transitions. The legend is horizontally aligned, floating at the top, and has a semi-transparent white background. Map navigation is enabled for user interaction. The data series includes animation, data labels formatted with postal codes, and a tooltip displaying the population density per square kilometer. The chart also includes export options for saving the chart as an image or PDF.
